quote: The sun shines upon good and bad alike. – Hans Christian Andersen
fact: The buzz from an electric razor in America plays in the key of B flat; Key of G in England.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: No matter how kind you are, German children are kinder.
